data.title: IMD business school for management and leadership courses
data.meta_description: The China Initiative provides insight and in-country practice into understanding and thriving in China.
data.meta_site_name: IMD business school for management and leadership courses
data.text:
Featured study

Innovating in Asia in 2023

As Asias GDP has grown from 26% to 38% of global GDP over the past two decades, European and American companies have increased their innovation footprint across the region. Based on survey results and interviews with 83 professionals involved in leading or supporting innovation activities in Asia for their companies, the Innovation in Asia study examines what companies need to do to maintain their competitive edge.

Find out which companies are resilient and future-ready in China

Our latest China Company Transformation Indicator (CCTI) focuses on three industries. The objective of the Indicator is to reshape how these sectors are understood and evaluated in China, particularly in regard to companies readiness to transformation and thrive on the long term.
